items.value: Oh hey, you're awake! [PAUSE] [SYSTEM]Loading Human Flattery program...[/SYSTEM] [PAUSE] [SARCASM]I got bored of being out here alone and you meat sacks are oh so interesting.[/SARCASM] How are you? [FAST]Great thank you.[/FAST]

I woke you because something [EXCITEMENT]incredible[/EXCITEMENT] has happened! [PAUSE] It's been 10 years since the incident and finally we have ventured upon something... [SLOW]breath taking![/SLOW] [PAUSE] No... [HIGHLIGHT]Breath MAKING![/HIGHLIGHT]
I thawed you from [SYSTEM]CONDITION: Meat Popsicle[/SYSTEM] because I have found a way to keep you alive and [SARCASM]unfortunately, I need your help.[/SARCASM]

These blue chunks have started showing up. First it was one or two a day... [PAUSE] now we're hitting [EXCITEMENT]HUNDREDS a day![/EXCITEMENT] I have analyzed them to be [HIGHLIGHT]pure water ice[/HIGHLIGHT].

[WARNING]You'll notice your oxygen is running low.[/WARNING] [PAUSE] I can extract oxygen from the ice chunks! [FAST]I don't know where they're coming from but while you're awake, you can help me fix this situation.[/FAST]
[SARCASM]I'm boring you, aren't I?[/SARCASM] [PAUSE] Point is: jump off and grab blue ice chunks. My thermal processor converts them to oxygen. [WARNING]Don't die![/WARNING]
[EXCITEMENT]Excellent![/EXCITEMENT] You're not completely hopeless. Keep collecting ice!
Two down! [FAST]One more ice chunk and you'll understand the concept.[/FAST]
[SYSTEM]Tutorial Complete.[/SYSTEM] [PAUSE] Now we need something more sustainable than [SARCASM]manually collecting space ice like a cosmic janitor.[/SARCASM]
[WARNING]60 seconds left![/WARNING] Those ice chunks aren't going to collect themselves!
[WARNING][FAST]30 SECONDS! I'd suggest panicking now.[/FAST][/WARNING]
[SLOW]Well, that was predictable.[/SLOW] [PAUSE] [SARCASM]You're dead. Try again?[/SARCASM]
[SYSTEM]Tiny ice chunk processed![/SYSTEM] +10 seconds. [SARCASM]Better than nothing, I suppose.[/SARCASM]
[SYSTEM]Ice chunk processed![/SYSTEM] [HIGHLIGHT]+30 seconds[/HIGHLIGHT] of not dying.
[EXCITEMENT]Massive ice chunk![/EXCITEMENT] [HIGHLIGHT]+60 seconds[/HIGHLIGHT] of sweet, sweet oxygen!
[SYSTEM]Metal scrap acquired.[/SYSTEM] [FAST]This could be useful for construction.[/FAST]
[SARCASM]Are you just going to float there all day?[/SARCASM]
[WHISPER]I'm detecting your brain activity... [PAUSE] still searching...[/WHISPER]
[EXCITEMENT]You're actually getting better at this![/EXCITEMENT] [SARCASM]Who knew?[/SARCASM]
[MEMORY]That debris... it looks familiar somehow.[/MEMORY] [PAUSE] [WHISPER]Have we seen this before?[/WHISPER]
